sentence.Network_en: Today I unearthed a copy of "90 Minutes" and had a chuckle at your article.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天我找到了一期《90分钟》杂志，读了你的文章咯咯笑了半天。

sentence.Network_en: Dead men don't bite, you know,'I added, with a chuckle.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不是说过吗, 死人是不咬人的. ” 我笑着又说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... chrysanthemum n． 菊，菊花 chuckle v． 轻声地笑 chunk n． 短厚木头，大量.
求WOW命令大全~_爱问知识人 ... /Chicken( 小鸡) /Chuckle( 轻笑) /Clap( 鼓掌).
笑在英语中的多种表达方式？_百度知道 ... giggle， 傻笑，咯咯笑 chuckle， 暗笑 snicker， 低声窃笑.
笑的英文_百度知道 ... .../sigh 叹气 / -轻声笑： chuckle；gluckste；glucksendes；grinnikte chuckle -尖笑： Cackle Cackle.

list.abs: He couldn ' t help chuckling at some of the little Boy ' s antics ., 那个小男孩的滑稽动作使他情不自禁地轻声发笑.
To guffaw 哄笑，大笑To chuckle 暗笑，偷偷的笑To chortle 大声的笑，咯咯的笑。.
That sounded pretty funny , but nobody dared chuckle ., 这话听着非常可笑 , 但没有一个人敢笑.
What are you chuckling about ?, 你独自笑什麽?

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'laugh convulsively'): from chuck meaning 'to cluck' in late Middle English

entry.def: When you chuckle, you laugh quietly.

example.ex: The banker chuckled and said, 'Of course not.'...
example.tran: 银行家暗自发笑并说道：“当然不。”

auth_sentence.content: They would chuckle and go back to their ranting.
auth_sentence.res_content: They would chuckle and go back to their ranting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They would chuckle and go back to their ranting.

auth_sentence.content: I still love the chuckle that comes after it.
auth_sentence.res_content: I still love the chuckle that comes after it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I still love the chuckle that comes after it.

auth_sentence.content: A tale which some antiquaries still chuckle over.
auth_sentence.res_content: A tale which some antiquaries still chuckle over.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A tale which some antiquaries still chuckle over.

means.word_mean: 轻声地笑, 低声轻笑

sentences.en: I could hear him chuckling to himself as he read his book.
sentences.cn: 他看书时, 我能听见他的轻声发笑。

jushi.english: He chuckled in response to her question.
jushi.chinese: 他轻轻一笑作为对她的问题的回答。
